category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_multitask_reassign_consolidated_email
preference.preference_description: Controls if a consolidated email notification to the new assignee should be sent in case of multiple task reassignments. Valid Values: * true: A single consolidated email is sent to the new assignee. * false: A separate email is sent for each task to the new assignee, if a notify handler is configured on the task's start action. This is the default value.
